Jacob West-Roberts

Ph.D. student in Environmental Science, Policy and Management.
Currently working in the Banfield lab at UC Berkeley.

I'm a bioinformatician and environmental scientist who studies the evolution of microbial metabolism. I'm also trying to fix my broken website. I'm especially interested in microbes that live in extreme environments, such as Acid Mine Drainage (see my about page for more on this).
